channel.title: One final error in client.java - please help
channel.description:
Alright, amazingly I started with 100 errors and got it down to one final little error, I've tried several things but I can't get it fixed, I'm not the best coder there is. :/
[code]Code:client.java:8885: not a statement server.textHandler;text(playerId); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
If anyone could help, please and thanks. Also this is deltascape source.

item.title: One final error in client.java - please help
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Sweet lord adog if it was alright for a man to kiss a man I’d kiss you. You solved my problem. Thanks to everyone else who tried though. rep++ to adog. I owe you.

Read full topic

item.source: One final error in client.java - please help

item.title: One final error in client.java - please help
item.dc:creator: @King_Redrum King Redrum
item.description:
@King_Redrum wrote:

Alright, when it was set like this:

server.textHandler.text(playerId);

It showed this:

client.java:8885: cannot find symbol symbol : method text(int) location: class textHandler server.textHandler.text(playerId); ^ client.java:14810: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer1 location: class client if(timer1 > 0) ^ client.java:14811: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer1 location: class client timer1--; ^ client.java:14812: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer2 location: class client if(timer2 > 0) ^ client.java:14813: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer2 location: class client timer2--; ^ client.java:14814: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer3 location: class client if(timer3 > 0) ^ client.java:14815: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer3 location: class client timer3--; ^ client.java:14816: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer4 location: class client if(timer4 > 0) ^ client.java:14817: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer4 location: class client timer4--; ^ client.java:14818: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer5 location: class client if(timer5 > 0) ^ client.java:14819: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer5 location: class client timer5--; ^ client.java:14820: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer6 location: class client if(timer6 > 0) ^ client.java:14821: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer6 location: class client timer6--; ^ client.java:14822: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer7 location: class client if(timer7 > 0) ^ client.java:14823: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer7 location: class client timer7--; ^ client.java:14824: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer8 location: class client if(timer8 > 0) ^ client.java:14825: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer8 location: class client timer8--; ^ client.java:14826: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer9 location: class client if(timer9 > 0) ^ client.java:14827: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer9 location: class client timer9--; ^ client.java:14828: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer10 location: class client if(timer10 > 0) ^ client.java:14829: cannot find symbol symbol : variable timer10 location: class client timer10--; ^ 21 errors Press any key to continue . . .

It gave me the ; symbol, so I just took a wild guess and replaced the . with the ;
So I changed it to this:

server.textHandler;text(playerId);

And it gave me this:

client.java:8885: not a statement server.textHandler;text(playerId); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

I’m a tad confused, really. Lol.

Also, to sabsasbi, I tried that already. It failed, sadly. It came back with another 20 or so errors.

Read full topic
